ComicInfo.Title: [Untitled]; The Origins of Evil Part Three: A Little Bit of Mayhem
ComicInfo.Summary:
Secrets revealed! G.I. Joe, the Autobots and M.A.S.K. make their way to Cybertron to stop the siege and encounter the COBRA leader, but all is not as it seems! Will their arrival help—or just bring more disaster?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Freddie E. Williams II & Jeremy Colwell | 1 | B | Cover B | Max Dunbar & Ander Zarate | 2 | C | Cover C | Alex Ronald | 3 | D | Cover D | Rob Duenas | 4 | RI-A | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Cover A | Jay Fosgitt | 5 | RI-B | 1:25 Retailer Incentive Cover B | Davidé Fabbri & Monica Kubina | 6 | RI-C | 1:50 Retailer Incentive Cover C | Leonardo Manco | 7 | RI-D | 1:50 Retailer Incentive Cover D | Whilce Portacio & Thomas Deer | 8 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-11-26 11:36:58. [CVDB621625]
